description:
Never leave the bikes at home again. This dual bike rack accommodates everything from fat tires to road bikes. Need to access your trunk or tailgate while loaded? No sweat – swing it out of the way for access to your vehicle. Mount to the EXO TopShelf for access to storage on the lower level.

  • Attach to the EXO SwingBase or EXO TopShelf using a tool-free cleat system
  • Swings away from your vehicle when access is needed
  • Fits bikes with wheel sizes from 20-29 inches and 4.8 inches wide
  • Carrying capacity: 18.2kg mounted on EXO TopShelf
  • Carrying capacity 22.7kg mounted on EXO SwingBase
  • Must have either EXO SwingBase or EXO TopShelf. (sold separately)
name: Yakima Exo DoubleUp
